title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 § 573.10 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 § 573.10 - Scope

State Regulations

These regulations (§§
573.9
-573.19) shall govern
vehicular and pedestrian traffic and parking upon the highways, streets, roads
and sidewalks owned, controlled or maintained by State University of New York

College of Agriculture and Technology at Cobleskill and shall apply to all
students, their visitors and guests. The State of New York Vehicle and Traffic

Law applies on campus streets and roadways. The Vehicle and Traffic Law and the
orders of the Department of Transportation shall be enforced by the Cobleskill
village justice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§
573.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
